room_title: Escape room "Bunker 57" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: We just had a good time in Bunker 57.  We were celebrating our son-in-law's birthday.  We are both 69 and 70 and found the challenge stimulating.

room_title: Escape room "Bunker 57" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: The quality of the bunker escape room was amazing, the puzzles were the perfect amount of difficulty, and the ambience was perfect! You can tell that the people who run it love what they do and are great at it! I had the best time ever! 10/10 will be going again!

room_title: Escape room "Bunker 57" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: Great experience! The bunker room struck a good balance between challenging puzzles and immersion. Definitely going back to check out the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Bunker 57" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: Had a great time on date night battling the Bunker 57 clues!! Can't wait to go back and try a different room!

room_title: Escape room "Bunker 57" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: Alternate Reality Escape room, Bunker, was fun and complex...clues were interesting and made you think. Definitely looking forward to trying other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Bunker 57" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: We have never been in an escape room before and now we are addicted! We loved them so much we did rooms only a couple of days apart. We first did the Piece Meal (failed) and it was amazing. It had cool special effects which i did not expect. Then we did the Bunker 57 and it was even better (we made it!). Bunker for me was more of a team effort and unusual. We all loved it!! Staff was very nice and helpful. I can't wait to try the next one. I have nothing negative to say. Great experience.
